```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
my_files <- list.files(path=here::here("card_data/"), pattern="*.csv", full.names = TRUE)
card_data <- read_csv(my_files, na = c("", "NA", "none"))
```

```{r}
card_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = brand)) +
  geom_bar(color = "white", fill = "black")
```

```{r}
card_data <- card_data %>% 
  mutate(
    brand = case_when(
      brand == "sportflicx" ~ "sportflics",
      TRUE ~ brand
    )
  )
sum(card_data$asg)
```

```{r}
card_data %>% 
  select(horizontal, rookie_card, opening_day, asg, special) %>% 
  map_dbl(sum)
```
